snippet.title: Fire at Hackett unit on Haddon Street
snippet.content:
Firefighters are working to extinguish a fire at a Hackett unit complex. ACT firefighters were called to the unit fire on Haddon Street at 6pm on Sunday.Photo: Karleen Minney The Emergency Services Agency said the fire extended from the second storey to the roof. Three pumpers, the breathing apparatus van and two commanders were at the scene. The ACT Ambulance Service was also on site.
More to come
